Package com.lmax.solana4j.programs

Class TokenProgram<T extends TokenProgram<? extends TokenProgram<T>>>

java.lang.Object
com.lmax.solana4j.programs.TokenProgram<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the Token program
Direct Known Subclasses:
Token2022Program
public class TokenProgram<T extends TokenProgram<? extends TokenProgram<T>>> extends Object
Program for managing token operations on the Solana blockchain.

  • Field Details

    • PROGRAM_ACCOUNT

      public static final PublicKey PROGRAM_ACCOUNT
      The public key for the token program account.

      This constant defines the public key associated with the Solana account for the token program. It is set to the value returned by Solana.account(byte[]) using the TOKEN_PROGRAM_ID.

    • ACCOUNT_LAYOUT_SPAN

      public static final int ACCOUNT_LAYOUT_SPAN
      The span (size) of the account layout in bytes.

      This constant defines the fixed size of an account layout for a Solana token account. For more details, see the Solana Token Program documentation.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MULTI_SIG_LAYOUT_SPAN

      public static final int MULTI_SIG_LAYOUT_SPAN
      The span (size) of the multi sig account layout in bytes.

      This constant defines the fixed size of a multi sig account layout for a Solana token account. For more details, see the Solana Token Program documentation.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • INITIALIZE_MINT_INSTRUCTION

      public static final int INITIALIZE_MINT_INSTRUCTION
      The instruction code for initializing a mint.

      This constant defines the instruction code used to initialize a new mint in the Solana token program.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • INITIALIZE_ACCOUNT_INSTRUCTION

      public static final int INITIALIZE_ACCOUNT_INSTRUCTION
      The instruction code for initializing an account.

      This constant defines the instruction code used to initialize a new account in the Solana token program.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • INITIALIZE_MULTISIG_INSTRUCTION

      public static final int INITIALIZE_MULTISIG_INSTRUCTION
      The instruction code for initializing a multisig account.

      This constant defines the instruction code used to initialize a new multisig account in the Solana token program.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TRANSFER_INSTRUCTION

      public static final int TRANSFER_INSTRUCTION
      The instruction code for transferring tokens.

      This constant defines the instruction code used to transfer tokens between accounts in the Solana token program.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SET_AUTHORITY_INSTRUCTION

      public static final int SET_AUTHORITY_INSTRUCTION
      The instruction code for setting an authority.

      This constant defines the instruction code used to set a new authority for a token account in the Solana token program.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MINT_TO_INSTRUCTION

      public static final int MINT_TO_INSTRUCTION
      The instruction code for minting new tokens to an account.

      This constant defines the instruction code used to mint new tokens to an existing account in the Solana token program.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

      Factory method for creating a new instance of TokenProgram.
      Parameters:
      tb - the transaction builder
      Returns:
      a new instance of TokenProgram

    • initializeAccount

      public T initializeAccount(PublicKey account, PublicKey mint, PublicKey owner)
      Initializes a new token account.
      Parameters:
      account - the public key of the new account
      mint - the public key of the mint
      owner - the public key of the account owner
      Returns:
      this TokenProgram instance

    • initializeMint

      public T initializeMint(PublicKey tokenMintAddress, byte decimals, PublicKey mintAuthority, Optional<PublicKey> freezeAuthority)
      Initializes a new mint.
      Parameters:
      tokenMintAddress - the public key of the token mint address
      decimals - the number of decimals for the new mint
      mintAuthority - the public key of the mint authority
      freezeAuthority - the public key of the freeze authority (optional)
      Returns:
      this TokenProgram instance

    • mintTo

      public T mintTo(PublicKey mint, PublicKey authority, List<Destination> destinations)
      Mints new tokens to a list of destinations.
      Parameters:
      mint - the public key of the mint
      authority - the public key of the authority
      destinations - the list of destinations to mint to
      Returns:
      this TokenProgram instance

    • transfer

      public T transfer(PublicKey source, PublicKey destination, PublicKey owner, long amount, List<PublicKey> signers)
      Transfers tokens between accounts.
      Parameters:
      source - the public key of the source account
      destination - the public key of the destination account
      owner - the public key of the owner account
      amount - the amount of tokens to transfer
      signers - the list of public keys of the signers
      Returns:
      this TokenProgram instance

    • initializeMultisig

      public T initializeMultisig(PublicKey multisigPublicKey, List<PublicKey> signers, int requiredSignatures)
      Initializes a new multisig account.
      Parameters:
      multisigPublicKey - the public key of the multisig account
      signers - the list of public keys of the signers
      requiredSignatures - the number of required signatures
      Returns:
      this TokenProgram instance

    • setAuthority

      public T setAuthority(PublicKey tokenAccount, PublicKey newAuthority, PublicKey oldAuthority, List<PublicKey> signers, TokenProgram.AuthorityType authorityType)
      Sets a new authority for a token account.
      Parameters:
      tokenAccount - the public key of the token account
      newAuthority - the public key of the new authority
      oldAuthority - the public key of the old authority
      signers - the list of public keys of the signers
      authorityType - the type of authority to set
      Returns:
      this TokenProgram instance
